BikeSack

Class GuiDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • BikeSack.Display
      • BikeSack.GuiDisplay

  • public class GuiDisplay
extends Display
    GuiDisplay draws a graphical display based representation of a motorcycle instrument cluster for the BikeSack system.

    A Map of Instrument objects is passed to ConsoleDisplay, which displays values based on the type of instrument (temperature, fuel, odometer etc.)

    Author:
    Ben Denford

    • Method Detail

      • show

        public void show(java.util.Map<BikeSack.INSTRUMENTS,Instrument> instruments)
        Draw the gauges and controls with the updated values of all instruments passed to this display.

        Specified by:
        show in class Display
        Parameters:
        instruments - Map of all instruments in the BikeSack system that require display for the rider's information.
        See Also:
        BikeSack.INSTRUMENTS, Instrument

        Parameters:

        on - Boolean to change the colour based on the state.
